message: I'm feeling generous, but this deal won't be on the table for long.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Okay, Alice. Let's be real.  We're running out of time and this back and forth is pointless. I'm proposing a fair 50/50 split. Take it before inflation eats away at both our shares.
